name: Saint Quest
description:
SYNOPSIS: An Evil Boss trapped Christian in a deep dark world. The only way to escape is to find and defeat this Evil Boss. Open rooms full of good or bad surprises and be lucky to succeed. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA [villains's voice]

SERIOUSLY: Saint Quest is minesweeper-like game that use dungeon-crawler type of storytelling and one-click turn-based-combat system [what a heck?!?...] Okidoki! Minesweeper + dungeon = saint quest ;)

WARNING: I try to make it easy but this game will make you upset :'(

TIP: Kill the Evil Boss 6 times and you will be free...you are in my prayer :)
